lesson_1.Title: Every summer
lesson_1.Memo:
"Idemo" means "We're going", but it can also mean "Let's go". If you support  Croatian soccer team for example, you would shout:
"Idemo Hrvatska!" = "Let's go Croatia!" or "Come on Croatia!".
" 'aj'mo Hrvatska!", means the same as the previous phrase. " 'aj'mo" is shortened from "Hajdemo", which also means "Let's go".

"Hrvatska" is native name of Croatia. Croatian language is "Hrvatski jezik". If you have come to this lesson already, you can say:
"Učim hrvatski." = "I'm learning Croatian."

lesson_2.Title: Way & road
lesson_2.Memo:
"Put" is the root of many words in Croatian language:
"Putnik" = "Traveler"
"Putovanje" = "Travel, trip"
"Putovnica" = "Passport"
"Usput" = "By the way"
...

lesson_3.Title: Asking for a way 1
lesson_3.Info: If you need to ask the way to some place...
lesson_3.Translation: I'm looking for the way to Split.
lesson_3.Memo:
"Tražim" means "I'm looking for".

You can also ask:
"Kojim putem do Zagreba?" = "Which way to Zagreb?", or simply:
"Put za Hvar?" = "The way to Hvar?"

lesson_4.Title: Asking for a way 2
lesson_4.Phrase: Je li ovo cesta za Dubrovnik?
lesson_4.Info: To make sure you are on the right road, ask...
lesson_4.Translation: Is this the road to Dubrovnik?
lesson_4.Memo: "Koja cesta ide do obale?" = "Which road goes to the shore?"

lesson_5.Title: Asking for a way 3
lesson_5.Info: The easy way to ask for directions is...
lesson_5.Memo: "Kako doći do plaže?" = "How to get to the beach?"

lesson_6.Title: Asking for help
lesson_6.Info: When you need to ask for help, you'd say...
lesson_6.Translation: Excuse me! Can you help me?

lesson_7.Title: Asking to see
lesson_7.Info: When you want someone to show you, you ask...
lesson_7.Memo:
Someone might answer you with:
"Vidite li ... ?" = "Can you see ... ?"

To which you might answer with:
"Vidim" = "I see", or
"Ne vidim" = "I don't see"

lesson_8.Title: Directions
lesson_8.Info: We often use these words for directions...

lesson_9.Title: On your way back home
lesson_9.Info: When someone is going to travel, we say...
lesson_9.Memo:
"Sretan" means both "Lucky" and "Happy" in Croatian.
"Sreća" = "Luck" or "Happiness"
